description:
Kricketina Kylie is a Pokémon Trainer from the Sinnoh Region. She labels herself the Bug-Type Queen of Sinnoh as she specializes in catching Bug-Type Pokémon. She has caught all of the Bug-Type Pokémon in the Sinnoh Region and is in the Kanto region to start catching Bug-type there.
Her Rotom Phone showed that she had caught the following Pokémon: Scyther, Yanma, Scizor, Wurmple, Silcoon, Beautifly, Cascoon, Dustox, Kricketot, Kricketune and Burmy.
At the Pokémon Center`s Pokémon trading event, she accepted a Pokémon World Coronation Series Great Class battle against Ash Ketchum. Before the match she was ranked 895 and Ash Ketchum was ranked 910. The battle was a 1-on-1 battle with one of her Heracross battling against Pikachu. She underestimated how strong Pikachu was and she lost the match which raised Ash Ketchum`s rank to 890.
name: Koromi
